description:
Taking up almost no room in your pocket, this slimline folder is big enough to get the job done. Designed to keep its footprint low, the Zilch tucks out of the way until you need it.

  • Drop point blade excels at everyday tasks and food prep
  • 7Cr17MoV blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well
  • Liner locking mechanism is reliable and easy to use
  • Textured glass reinforced nylon handle is tough and grippy
  • Lanyard hole adds retention and the option to add personalized lanyard
  • Pocket clip is designed for right handed tip-up carry
name: Gerber Zilch Knife
